name: Gorkball Champions
description:
Gorkball Champions is a fusion of football and brawling. To become a champion of Gorkball you must score more than the other team. Currently there's no limit of how many goals you want to make. You and your teammate must brawl your way to get the ball, run and support your mate. 

Keys:  WASD for movement and mouse 1 for punching.

Theme inspiration of game genre fusion are football and first person shooter / beat 'em up.
